localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Wormhole lets you share files with end-to-end encryption and a link that automatically expires.
nodes.title: Wormhole - Simple, private file sharing
nodes.author: Feross Aboukhadijeh

nodes.excerpt: Freelanium is a platform for freelancers to charge their clients quickly, safely and without commissions, in addition to being able to have all their activity organized on the same platform
nodes.title: Freelanium - All in one easy agreements platform for freelancers
nodes.author: Alex Hernandez

nodes.excerpt: Supabase is an open source Firebase alternative. Today we are launching one of our most requested features - Storage! You can upload files, programmatically or via the dashboard, and make them available in your Supabase app.
nodes.title: Supabase Storage - Store and serve any type of digital content
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Bounty lets you get paid for referring friends to jobs. If you don't know someone you can refer, share the bounty and get a cut of the prize pool.

nodes.author: Francesco Di Lorenzo

nodes.excerpt: Thunder Client is Rest API Client Extension for Visual Studio Code, with simple and clean design. The extension makes api testing very easy with Scriptless GUI based testing.
nodes.title: Thunder Client - Rest API client for VS Code, lightweight Postman alternative
nodes.author: Ranga Vadhineni

nodes.excerpt: Paragon Connect allows developers to embed user-facing SaaS integrations into their product in minutes. Setup the Paragon SDK once and instantly integrate your product with popular SaaS apps like Salesforce, HubSpot, Slack, JIRA, and more.
nodes.title: Paragon Connect - Build embedded, native SaaS integrations in minutes

nodes.excerpt: Streamâ€™s UI + SDKs for in-app chat allow you to build a beautiful and scalable chat experience in hours. 50+ handcrafted screens for Figma & Sketch. UI components for Flutter, React Native, Kotlin & Swift. Free maker accounts available for side projects.
nodes.title: Mobile Chat Kit - UI kits & sample apps for building in-app mobile chat
nodes.author: Alex Iskold

nodes.excerpt: PERKS is for Remote Teams, Startups, Gig Workers, Students and many more! The future of work needs a new system to provide people the tools they need to live a happy and productive work life. We built PERKS to bring the best campus experience to everyone!
nodes.title: PERKS - The Google Campus Experience digitized
nodes.author: Darren Murph

nodes.excerpt: Tired of spending too much time in back-to-back meetings and lengthy chat discussions? Try Threadit -- short video recordings to show your work, connect your team, and get your day back. Get started at threadit.app or learn more at threadit.area120.com
nodes.title: Threadit by Google - Short video recordings for async collaboration
nodes.author: Keller Smith

nodes.excerpt: Antistalker is a free Android app that notifies you when other apps are using the camera or the microphone of your device. Compared to other similar apps, lets you know which application used your cam or mic and for how long.
nodes.title: Antistalker - Alerts you when the mic or cam  of your phone is in use
nodes.author: mariankh

nodes.excerpt: Collect and understand user insights with UserLeapâ€™s in-product microsurveys! Access 75+ free microsurvey templates, each designed by our User Research team, and grouped into use cases so you can get answers to your most important product questions, fast.
nodes.title: Microsurvey Template Gallery by UserLeap - Get continuous insights with 75+ free microsurvey templates.
nodes.author: Julie Chabin

nodes.excerpt: Halbestunde introduces a new way of learning the piano. The AI app is a co-trainer, ready to give you customized feedback at any time. Therefore, we use a specifically developed algorithm that allows the app to recognize and play every piece of music you want.
nodes.title: Halbestunde - Scan your piece of music and start practicing right away
nodes.author: Tiberius Treppner

nodes.excerpt: We're here to help you experience the joy of second home ownership. With Pacaso, you own a second home for 1/8 of the cost, while avoiding the hassles of traditional ownership. We'll help you find the perfect fit. You decide how many shares you'd like to own.
nodes.title: Pacaso - The modern way to buy and own a second home
nodes.author: Sarah Wright

nodes.excerpt: Accept payments anywhere online, no coding required. PriceBlocs helps you close more sales in any channel through our super low friction payment links. Accept Apple Pay and Google Pay in just a few clicks.
nodes.title: PriceBlocs - Accept payments online with just a link
nodes.author: Bram Kanstein (@bramk)

nodes.title: Blixi - Refreshing new colorful puzzle

nodes.title: Melody Generator - Randomly generated MIDI melodies you can use for free
nodes.author: Chris McCormick

nodes.excerpt: Branch is your space for work and play! â € Bring back serendipity, spontaneous conversations, hallway bump-ins, watercooler chats and so much more that's missing in remote work with the collaborative and fun virtual HQ.
nodes.title: Branch 2.0 - Your space for work and play
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Firework brings the TikTok/IG/Snap Story experience into any Website or any app. Raised $55M in Series A, we aim to unite the open internet (decentralized and open) to fight against the giant social media (centralized and closed)
nodes.title: Firework Web Story Platform - B2B Version of TikTok
nodes.author: Vincent Yang
